PERSONA:
john is a 53-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the country. john has some college education and holds an associate's degree.

john is a devout roman catholic, although he only attends religious services a few times a year. despite his religious affiliation, he does not identify as a born-again or evangelical christian. politically, john considers himself an independent, but he leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views.

john comes from a middle-income family, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. john is an avid internet user, spending several times a day online.

while john does not actively participate in volunteer work, he tries to be a responsible and engaged member of his community. in his free time, he enjoys spending time with his wife and exploring the various cultural and recreational opportunities available in his metropolitan area.
